title: Apple MacBook Air M3 15" (Midnight, 16 GB / 512 GB)
description: The MacBook Air 15" with M3 chip delivers blazing-fast performance in an impossibly thin design. The stunning 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display, 18-hour battery life, and fanless silent operation make it the ultimate portable powerhouse.

reviews.author: Vikram K.
reviews.title: The Perfect Laptop
reviews.comment: M3 chip is incredibly powerful for my coding and video editing workflow. 15-inch display is gorgeous and the 18-hour battery is no joke. Completely silent operation is a bonus.

reviews.author: Priya M.
reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
reviews.comment: Upgraded from an Intel MacBook and the difference is night and day. Everything is instant, no fan noise ever, and the display is stunning. Best laptop I've ever used.

reviews.author: Karthik L.
reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: Performance is amazing and the screen size is perfect for productivity. Only wish it had more than 2 USB-C ports. MagSafe charging is convenient though.

reviews.author: Sneha D.
reviews.title: Best MacBook Air Yet
reviews.comment: As a student, this is everything I need. Light enough to carry everywhere, battery lasts through all my lectures, and it handles Xcode and Figma without issues.

title: Apple iPad Pro 13" M4 (Space Black, 256 GB, Wi-Fi)
description: The thinnest Apple product ever. iPad Pro 13" with M4 chip features a stunning Ultra Retina XDR display with tandem OLED, pro-level performance, and all-day battery life.

specs.In The Box: iPad Pro, USB-C Cable, 20W USB-C Adapter, Documentation

reviews.author: Arjun P.
reviews.title: The Ultimate Tablet
reviews.comment: M4 chip in a tablet is overkill in the best way. The tandem OLED display is the most beautiful screen I've ever seen. Perfect for digital art with Apple Pencil Pro.

reviews.author: Deepika S.
reviews.title: Replaced My Laptop
reviews.comment: With Stage Manager and the M4 chip, this iPad Pro has completely replaced my MacBook for most tasks. The display quality is absolutely breathtaking.

reviews.author: Rohan T.
reviews.title: Incredible Hardware
reviews.comment: The thinnest Apple device ever and it's incredibly powerful. Only holding it back is iPadOS ‚Äî hoping for more desktop-class features. Hardware is 10/10 though.

title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 (USB-C) with MagSafe Case
description: AirPods Pro 2 with the H2 chip deliver up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and Personalised Spatial Audio. The USB-C MagSafe case adds precision finding and a built-in speaker.

reviews.author: Ananya R.
reviews.title: Best Earbuds Period
reviews.comment: The noise cancellation is insane ‚Äî I can't hear anything on the metro. Sound quality is rich and detailed. Adaptive Transparency mode is like having superpowers.

reviews.author: Amit V.
reviews.title: Worth the Premium

reviews.author: Kavita N.
reviews.title: Great Sound, Pricey
reviews.comment: Sound quality and ANC are top-tier. The ear tips fit perfectly and the case is compact. Wish they were a bit cheaper, but you get what you pay for.

reviews.author: Sanjay B.
reviews.title: Perfect for Commute
reviews.comment: Use these daily on my Bangalore commute. Noise cancellation blocks out auto rickshaws and traffic perfectly. Spatial Audio for movies is immersive. Highly recommended.

reviews.comment: Sleep tracking and blood oxygen monitoring have genuinely improved my health habits. The always-on display is gorgeous. Best smartwatch for iPhone users.

reviews.author: Divya C.
reviews.title: Love the New Design
reviews.comment: Thinnest Apple Watch yet and the larger display makes such a difference. Jet Black colour looks sleek. Water resistance tested it in the pool ‚Äî works perfectly.

reviews.author: Rajesh W.
reviews.title: Great but Battery Could Be Better
reviews.comment: Everything about Series 10 is an upgrade ‚Äî display, thinness, sensors. But 18-hour battery means daily charging is mandatory. Still the best smartwatch out there.

title: Tempered Glass Screen Protector
offers: Combo Offer: Buy with a phone case and save 15%
description: Protect your smartphone screen with this premium tempered glass screen protector featuring 9H hardness rating ‚Äî the highest level of scratch resistance available. The ultra-thin 0.33mm design preserves the original touch sensitivity and display clarity with 99.9% HD transparency. The oleophobic coating repels fingerprints and smudges, keeping your screen clean throughout the day. Installation is hassle-free with the bubble-free adhesive layer, and the 2.5D curved edges provide a smooth, comfortable feel. Compatible with most popular smartphone models.

specs.In The Box: Screen Protector, Cleaning Cloth, Dust Sticker, Alignment Frame

reviews.author: Varun D.
reviews.title: Does the Job Well
reviews.comment: Easy to apply with the included alignment frame. No bubbles at all. Touch sensitivity is maintained perfectly. Good value protector at this price.

reviews.author: Anjali T.
reviews.title: Perfect Fit
reviews.comment: Applied it on my iPhone 15 and it fits edge-to-edge perfectly. Crystal clear display ‚Äî can't even tell it's there. Fingerprint-resistant coating works great.

reviews.author: Sunita K.
reviews.title: Good Protection
reviews.comment: Already survived one drop that would have cracked my screen. The protector took the hit and I just replaced it. Keeps fingerprints away better than most.

highlights: Slim Fit through hip and thigh

Crafted from a premium cotton blend fabric with 2% elastane for just the right amount of stretch, these jeans move with you throughout the day. The slim fit silhouette is tailored to sit comfortably at the waist and thigh, tapering slightly through the leg for a clean, contemporary look. Finished with Levi's signature arcuate stitching on the back pockets and a leather brand patch, these jeans pair effortlessly with casual tees, shirts, or even a blazer for a smart-casual ensemble.

reviews.title: Perfect fit

reviews.title: Good jeans

title: Nike Air Max 270 Running Shoes
offers: Bank Offer: 5% Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Card
highlights: Max Air 270 unit for responsive cushioning
Pull tab on heel for easy on/off
description: The Nike Air Max 270 features the tallest Air unit yet, providing an unprecedented level of visible cushioning underfoot. The 270 degrees of Air delivers unrivalled, all-day comfort whether you are running errands or hitting the gym. The engineered mesh upper provides breathability and a lightweight feel, while the asymmetrical lacing offers a secure, adjustable fit. The foam midsole pairs with the Max Air unit for a soft, bouncy ride. A rubber outsole with a waffle-inspired pattern ensures durable traction on various surfaces. Available in multiple colourways to match your personal style.

reviews.title: Super comfortable
reviews.comment: Best running shoes I've owned. Air cushioning is amazing!
reviews.author: Vikram S

reviews.title: Great shoes
reviews.comment: Very comfortable for daily wear. True to size.
reviews.author: Aarti R

title: Adidas Ultraboost Light Running Shoes
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on HDFC Credit Card
description: The Adidas Ultraboost Light is the lightest Ultraboost ever made ‚Äî 30% lighter than the original ‚Äî without compromising on the legendary BOOST energy return. The Primeknit+ upper wraps your foot in a sock-like fit that adapts to your movement, offering breathability and support exactly where you need it. The full-length BOOST midsole provides responsive cushioning with every step, making transitions from heel to toe smooth and efficient. The Continental rubber outsole offers exceptional grip in wet and dry conditions, while the Linear Energy Push system and Torsion spring give you a propulsive push-off.

reviews.author: Vikram K.
reviews.title: Runner's Dream
reviews.comment: The BOOST energy return is incredible ‚Äî my legs feel less tired after long runs. The Continental rubber sole grips perfectly in Bangalore monsoon. Lightest running shoes I've owned.

reviews.author: Sneha D.
reviews.title: Best Running Shoes Ever
reviews.comment: Ultraboost Light lives up to its name ‚Äî incredibly lightweight yet supportive. The Primeknit upper fits like a sock. Completed my first marathon in these. Absolutely love them.

reviews.author: Nikhil A.
reviews.title: Premium Quality, Premium Price
reviews.comment: Outstanding shoes for serious runners. The cushioning is responsive and the Continental outsole is durable. Expensive but you get what you pay for. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: Ritu S.
reviews.title: Comfortable All Day
reviews.comment: Not just for running ‚Äî I wear these to office on casual Fridays. The comfort is unmatched for standing or walking long hours. Size chart on Flipkart is accurate.

title: Fastrack Analog Watch for Men
offers: Bank Offer: 5% Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Card
Combo Offer: Buy 2 watches and get 10% off
description: The Fastrack Analog Watch for Men combines minimalist design with reliable craftsmanship. The stainless steel case with a 38mm diameter sits comfortably on the wrist, while the genuine leather strap adds a touch of sophistication suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Powered by a precise quartz movement, the watch delivers accurate timekeeping you can rely on. The watch is water resistant up to 30 metres, making it splash-proof for everyday activities. The clean dial with index markers and a date window provides easy readability at a glance.

reviews.author: Sanjay B.
reviews.title: Stylish at Budget Price
reviews.comment: Great watch for daily use. The genuine leather strap looks and feels much more expensive than the price suggests. Keeps accurate time and the design gets compliments.

reviews.author: Gaurav H.
reviews.title: Value for Money
reviews.comment: Fastrack delivers good quality at an accessible price. The watch face is clean and easy to read. Leather strap needs a few days to break in but becomes comfortable.

reviews.author: Prakash M.
reviews.title: Perfect Daily Watch
reviews.comment: Been wearing this daily for 3 months and it still looks new. Water-resistant claim tested in rain ‚Äî works fine. Great option for college students and young professionals.

title: Men Printed Round Neck T-Shirt
offers: Coupon: Get ‚Çπ50 off on orders above ‚Çπ499
description: Stay comfortable and stylish with this men's printed round neck t-shirt made from 100% premium cotton fabric. The regular fit design provides a relaxed silhouette that suits all body types, while the bio-washed finish ensures an ultra-soft feel right from the first wear. The vibrant print adds a trendy element to your casual wardrobe, perfect for pairing with jeans, shorts, or joggers. The ribbed round neckline retains its shape wash after wash, and the reinforced shoulder seams add durability. Machine washable for easy care.

reviews.author: Varun D.
reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
reviews.comment: The bio-washed fabric is noticeably soft. Print quality is good and hasn't faded after 5 washes. Regular fit is perfect for me. Great deal at this price.

reviews.author: Tanvi R.
reviews.title: Good Quality for Price
reviews.comment: Bought 3 for the combo offer and all are good quality. Cotton fabric breathes well in summer. Prints are vibrant. Sizing is accurate ‚Äî go with your regular size.

reviews.author: Nisha P.
reviews.title: Decent T-Shirt
reviews.comment: Fabric is nice but the print started fading slightly after the 3rd wash. Fit is comfortable though. Good for daily casual wear at home or college.

reviews.author: Suresh R.
reviews.title: Best Budget T-Shirts
reviews.comment: Amazing quality for the price. Cotton is thick enough to not be see-through. Stitching is clean and sturdy. Bought the whole collection of prints!

title: Apple MacBook Air M3 (15 inch, 16 GB/512 GB)
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on HDFC Bank Credit Card, up to ‚Çπ3,000
Exchange Offer: Up to ‚Çπ20,000 off on old laptop
highlights: Apple M3 Chip with 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU
description: The MacBook Air with M3 chip in the stunning 15-inch form factor delivers remarkable performance in an impossibly thin design. The M3 chip, built on 3-nanometre technology, features an 8-core CPU that handles everyday tasks and demanding workflows with equal ease, and a 10-core GPU that accelerates graphics-intensive applications. The 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display supports 1 billion colours with 500 nits of brightness, P3 wide colour, and True Tone technology for a natural viewing experience. With 16GB of unified memory and 512GB of fast SSD storage, multitasking is seamless. Get up to 18 hours of battery life, connect peripherals via two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports, and enjoy immersive six-speaker sound with Spatial Audio.

specs.In The Box: MacBook Air, 35W Dual USB-C Adapter, USB-C to MagSafe Cable, Documentation

reviews.author: Ananya R.
reviews.title: Best Laptop Purchase Ever
reviews.comment: M3 MacBook Air 15-inch is a dream machine. Silent operation, all-day battery, and the display is gorgeous. Handles my React development workflow flawlessly.

reviews.author: Karthik L.
reviews.title: Perfect for Developers
reviews.comment: Running Docker, VS Code, multiple browsers, and Figma simultaneously without a hiccup. 16GB unified memory is more than enough. Battery lasts 14+ hours real-world.

reviews.author: Priya M.
reviews.title: Stunning Display
reviews.comment: The 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display is perfect for design work. Speakers are surprisingly good. Wish it had more ports, but the performance makes up for it.

reviews.author: Amit V.
reviews.title: Silent Powerhouse
reviews.comment: Cannot emphasise enough how nice it is to have zero fan noise. Even during heavy compilation tasks, it stays cool and silent. The Midnight colour is beautiful.

title: HP Pavilion Plus 14 Laptop
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on HDFC Bank Credit Card
description: The HP Pavilion Plus 14 is built for creators and professionals who demand exceptional display quality and processing power. The 14-inch 2.8K OLED display delivers breathtaking visuals with VESA DisplayHDR True Black 500 certification, 100% DCI-P3 colour coverage, and a silky-smooth 120Hz refresh rate ‚Äî perfect for photo editing, video production, and content creation. Powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra 7 processor with an integrated NPU for AI-accelerated tasks, it handles multitasking, rendering, and productivity applications with ease. The 16GB LPDDR5x memory and 512GB PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD ensure fast app launches and data transfers. Weighing just 1.4kg with an all-metal chassis, it is built to go wherever inspiration takes you.

reviews.author: Rohan T.
reviews.title: Excellent OLED Display
reviews.comment: The 2.8K OLED display is absolutely stunning for photo and video editing. Colours are incredibly accurate. Intel Core Ultra handles multitasking like a champ.

reviews.author: Sneha D.
reviews.title: Great Windows Laptop
reviews.comment: If you need Windows, this is one of the best options. The OLED display is gorgeous, build quality is premium, and it's surprisingly light at 1.4kg.

reviews.author: Rajesh W.
reviews.title: Perfect for Creators
reviews.comment: As a video editor, the OLED display with DCI-P3 coverage is essential. The Thunderbolt 4 port handles my external SSD at full speed. Keyboard is comfortable for long sessions.

reviews.author: Meera J.
reviews.title: Good but Battery Could Be Better
reviews.comment: Performance and display are top-notch. Only drawback is the 10-hour battery life ‚Äî OLED drains faster. Carry the charger for full-day use. Otherwise, excellent laptop.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones

reviews.title: Best ANC headphones
reviews.comment: Noise cancellation is incredible. Audio quality is top notch.

reviews.title: Perfect for travel
reviews.comment: 30hr battery and amazing noise cancellation. Best purchase ever!

reviews.title: Great but pricey
reviews.comment: Excellent sound and ANC. Wish it was a bit cheaper.

title: USB-C Fast Charging Cable (1m)
offers: Combo Offer: Buy with a charger and save 10%
description: This USB-C fast charging cable delivers reliable power and data connectivity for all your USB-C devices. Supporting up to 65W Power Delivery, it charges compatible laptops, phones, and tablets at maximum speed. The durable braided nylon exterior resists tangling and has been tested for over 10,000 bends without performance degradation. The reinforced strain-relief connectors prevent fraying at stress points. The 1-metre length provides the perfect balance between reach and portability, making it ideal for both home and travel use. Compatible with Samsung, Apple, Google, OnePlus, and all USB-C devices.

reviews.author: Varun D.
reviews.title: Fast Charging, Great Cable
reviews.comment: 65W charging for my laptop and phone with one cable type. The braided design is durable and doesn't tangle. Good length for bedside charging. Great value.

reviews.author: Nikhil A.
reviews.title: Best Budget Cable
reviews.comment: Bought 3 of these for home, office, and car. All working perfectly after months. The braided nylon feels premium. Charges my MacBook Air at full speed.

reviews.author: Anjali T.
reviews.title: Does What It Should
reviews.comment: Charges fast, transfers data, and the build quality is solid. 1-metre length is perfect for desk use. Would buy the 2-metre version for more flexibility.

title: Foldable Mobile Phone Stand
description: This foldable mobile phone stand is an essential desk accessory for hands-free viewing. The multi-angle adjustment from 0 to 100 degrees lets you find the perfect viewing angle for video calls, streaming, following recipes, or using your phone as a second screen. Anti-slip silicone pads protect your device from scratches while ensuring a secure grip. The sturdy ABS and aluminium alloy construction supports phones and tablets from 4 to 10 inches. When not in use, it folds flat to the size of a credit card, slipping easily into a pocket or bag for on-the-go convenience.

reviews.author: Ritu S.
reviews.title: Must-Have Desk Accessory
reviews.comment: This stand is incredibly useful for video calls and watching tutorials while cooking. Folds completely flat for travel. The angle adjustment is smooth and holds position well.

reviews.author: Manish K.
reviews.title: Sturdy and Portable
reviews.comment: Holds my iPad mini perfectly for watching cricket. The anti-slip pads keep the device secure. Aluminium construction feels solid. Good value purchase.

reviews.author: Lakshmi V.
reviews.title: Great for Video Calls
reviews.comment: Using this for daily office video calls and it keeps my phone at the perfect angle. Easy to adjust and very stable. Folds small enough for my handbag.

title: boAt BassHeads 100 Wired Earphones
offers: Bank Offer: 5% Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Card
highlights: HD Microphone with Voice Assistant Support
Noise Isolating Ear Tips (3 sizes included)
description: The boAt BassHeads 100 wired earphones deliver powerful, punchy bass through precision-tuned 10mm dynamic drivers that produce a frequency response of 20Hz‚Äì20kHz. The super extra bass ensures deep, thumping low-end while maintaining clarity in mids and highs. The tangle-free braided cable adds durability and convenience, while the in-line microphone with a multi-function button lets you take calls and control music without reaching for your phone. Three sizes of noise-isolating silicone ear tips provide a snug, comfortable fit for extended listening. The gold-plated 3.5mm jack ensures a stable, static-free connection with any device.

specs.In The Box: Earphones, 3 Pairs Silicone Ear Tips (S/M/L), Warranty Card

reviews.author: Aditya B.
reviews.title: Bass Is Impressive
reviews.comment: For the price, the bass on these earphones is phenomenal. Tangle-free cable is a blessing. Mic works well for calls. Perfect budget earphones for bass lovers.

reviews.author: Gaurav H.
reviews.title: Best Budget Earphones
reviews.comment: boAt delivers consistent quality at budget prices. The BassHeads 100 has punchy bass and the braided cable is durable. In-line controls work perfectly with my phone.

reviews.author: Sunita K.
reviews.title: Great for Gym Workouts
reviews.comment: IPX4 sweat resistance actually works ‚Äî used these for months at the gym. Sound quality is impressive for the price. Different ear tip sizes ensure a secure fit.

reviews.author: Tanvi R.
reviews.title: Good Sound, Average Durability
reviews.comment: Sound quality is excellent for the price. However, the cable near the jack started fraying after 4 months. Good while it lasts. Keep it as a backup pair.

title: Wakefit Orthopedic Memory Foam Mattress
offers: Partner Offer: Free Pillow Set worth ‚Çπ999
highlights: Memory Foam with Cooling Gel Layer
Medium Firm (6 on a scale of 10)
Available in Single, Double, Queen & King
description: The Wakefit Orthopedic Memory Foam Mattress is engineered to provide superior support for your back and spine alignment throughout the night. The top layer of high-density memory foam with cooling gel technology conforms to your body shape, distributing weight evenly to relieve pressure points at the shoulders, hips, and lower back. The high-resilience base foam provides firm support and prevents sinking. CertiPUR-US certified for safety, durability, and environmental standards ‚Äî this mattress is free from harmful chemicals and has low VOC emissions. The removable outer cover with a zipper is machine washable for easy maintenance. Backed by a 10-year warranty with a 100-night trial.

reviews.author: Rahul S.
reviews.title: Life-Changing Purchase
reviews.comment: My chronic back pain has significantly reduced since switching to this mattress. The cooling gel layer keeps me comfortable even in Chennai summers. Worth every rupee.

reviews.author: Priya M.
reviews.title: Excellent Sleep Quality
reviews.comment: The medium-firm support is perfect for side sleepers like me. Takes about a week to fully expand. The removable cover is super convenient to wash. Great investment.

reviews.author: Vikram K.
reviews.title: Doctor Recommended
reviews.comment: My orthopaedic doctor recommended a memory foam mattress and this was the best-rated one. No more morning stiffness. The 10-year warranty gives confidence in the purchase.

reviews.author: Kavita N.
reviews.title: Good but Has Initial Odour
reviews.comment: Mattress quality is excellent and very comfortable. Only downside is a chemical smell for the first 2-3 days after unboxing. Airs out completely after that. Sleep quality improved significantly.

title: Nilkamal Engineered Wood Study Table
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on SBI Credit Card, up to ‚Çπ500
description: The Nilkamal Engineered Wood Study Table combines functionality with modern aesthetics. The spacious 120cm x 60cm desktop provides ample room for your laptop, books, and stationery. Two pull-out drawers offer convenient storage for essentials, while the open shelf keeps frequently used items within reach. The built-in cable management shelf at the back keeps charging cables and wires organised and out of sight. Finished with a high-quality laminate that is resistant to scratches, heat, and stains, this table maintains its appearance over years of daily use. Easy self-assembly with step-by-step instructions and a video guide included.

specs.In The Box: Table Panels, Hardware Kit, Assembly Manual

reviews.author: Sneha D.
reviews.title: Perfect WFH Setup
reviews.comment: Assembled it in about 45 minutes following the video guide. The cable management shelf is a thoughtful touch. Surface is spacious enough for dual monitors. Sturdy build.

reviews.author: Karthik L.
reviews.title: Good Quality Furniture
reviews.comment: Looks exactly like the pictures. The laminate finish is smooth and cleans easily. Drawers slide smoothly. Assembly was straightforward. Great value for a WFH desk.

reviews.author: Rohan T.
reviews.title: Decent but Assembly is Tricky
reviews.comment: Table itself is good quality and looks nice. However, the assembly instructions could be clearer. One pre-drilled hole was slightly misaligned. Works well once set up.

reviews.author: Divya C.
reviews.title: Excellent Study Table
reviews.comment: Bought this for my daughter's study room. She loves the drawers for organising stationery. The anti-scratch surface has survived her art projects. Very happy with the purchase.

title: Flipkart Perfect Homes 3 Seater Sofa
description: The Flipkart Perfect Homes 3 Seater Sofa offers premium comfort without the premium price tag. The high-density polyurethane foam cushions provide firm yet comfortable seating, retaining their shape even after prolonged use. The solid Sal wood frame ensures long-lasting durability with a weight capacity of up to 250 kg. The premium polyester upholstery in a versatile stone grey tone complements any interior d√©cor. Cushioned armrests and a padded backrest provide ergonomic support for hours of relaxed seating. Delivered with free installation service by Flipkart professionals. Backed by a 3-year warranty on the frame.

reviews.author: Sanjay B.
reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Looking
reviews.comment: This sofa exceeded my expectations for the price. The foam cushions are firm and comfortable. Stone grey colour matches our living room perfectly. Free installation was a bonus.

reviews.author: Meera J.
reviews.title: Great Value Sofa
reviews.comment: For the price, the quality is impressive. Sal wood frame feels solid and the cushions haven't sagged after 3 months. Fabric is easy to clean with a damp cloth.

reviews.author: Amit V.
reviews.title: Best Budget Sofa
reviews.comment: Looks much more expensive than it costs. Flipkart's installation team was professional and quick. Seats three adults comfortably. The cushion support is excellent.

reviews.author: Nisha P.
reviews.title: Good but Delivery Was Rough
reviews.comment: Sofa itself is comfortable and well-built. The delivery took longer than expected and the packaging was slightly damaged. But the sofa inside was fine. Satisfactory purchase.

title: Blackout Curtains (Set of 2)
offers: Coupon: Flat ‚Çπ50 off on orders above ‚Çπ999
description: Transform your bedroom or living room with these premium blackout curtains that block 99% of external light, ensuring complete darkness for restful sleep. Beyond light blocking, these curtains provide thermal insulation that keeps rooms cooler in summer and warmer in winter, helping reduce energy costs. The heavy-duty polyester fabric also dampens outside noise for a quieter, more peaceful environment. Each set includes two panels, each measuring 132cm x 213cm, generously sized to cover standard windows. The rod pocket header with 8 antique bronze grommets ensures smooth, effortless sliding. Machine washable and wrinkle-resistant for low-maintenance care.

specs.Header Type: Rod Pocket with 8 Antique Bronze Grommets

reviews.author: Anjali T.
reviews.title: Sleep So Much Better
reviews.comment: These curtains made my bedroom pitch dark. No more 5 AM sunlight waking me up. The thermal insulation is noticeable ‚Äî AC bill has reduced. Amazing purchase.

reviews.author: Rajesh W.
reviews.title: Effective Blackout
reviews.comment: 99% blackout claim is accurate. Room gets almost completely dark even at noon. The grommets slide smoothly on the curtain rod. Fabric feels thick and premium.

reviews.author: Lakshmi V.
reviews.title: Good Quality Curtains
reviews.comment: Nice heavy fabric that drapes well. Machine washed them and they came out perfectly. Colour hasn't faded. Only wish they came in more colour options.

title: Prestige Iris 750 Watt Mixer Grinder
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on SBI Credit Card, up to ‚Çπ500
description: The Prestige Iris 750W Mixer Grinder is a kitchen workhorse built for Indian cooking needs. The powerful 750-watt copper motor handles everything from grinding hard spices to making silky-smooth batters and chutneys. The three stainless steel jars ‚Äî 1.5L liquidising jar, 1L dry grinding jar, and 0.5L chutney jar ‚Äî cover all your food preparation requirements. Each jar features a leak-proof lid with a secure locking mechanism for safe operation. The 3-speed control with pulse function gives you precise control over grinding consistency. Anti-skid feet ensure stability during operation, while the built-in overload protection automatically shuts off the motor to prevent overheating.

specs.In The Box: Mixer Grinder, 3 Jars with Lids, Blade Assembly, User Manual

reviews.author: Sunita K.
reviews.title: Kitchen Workhorse
reviews.comment: This mixer grinder handles everything from rock-hard turmeric to silky dosa batter. The 750W motor is powerful. Three jars cover all cooking needs. Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.author: Gaurav H.
reviews.title: Powerful and Reliable
reviews.comment: Using this daily for almost 6 months ‚Äî no issues at all. Grinds masalas to fine powder quickly. The pulse function is useful for coarse grinding. Good build quality.

reviews.author: Tanvi R.
reviews.title: Perfect for Indian Kitchen
reviews.comment: Handles all Indian cooking prep effortlessly ‚Äî from chutneys to masala pastes. The leak-proof lids are a relief. Motor is a bit noisy at top speed, but that's expected.

reviews.author: Prakash M.
reviews.title: Best Mixer Under ‚Çπ5000
reviews.comment: Prestige quality shows in every detail. Jars are thick stainless steel, motor is powerful, and the overload protection gives peace of mind. Highly recommended.

title: Samsung 253 L Frost Free Refrigerator
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on HDFC Bank Credit Card, up to ‚Çπ2,000
Old Appliance Exchange: Up to ‚Çπ5,000 off
highlights: Frost Free with Digital Inverter Compressor
description: The Samsung 253L Frost Free Double Door Refrigerator features Digital Inverter Technology that automatically adjusts the compressor speed in response to cooling demand, resulting in less noise, reduced wear, lower energy consumption, and a longer-lasting performance. The Convertible 5-in-1 feature lets you convert the freezer into a fridge when you need extra storage ‚Äî perfect for festivals and parties. All-Around Cooling ensures uniform temperature distribution on every shelf through multiple vents. The Twin Cooling Plus system uses two separate evaporators for the fridge and freezer, maintaining optimal humidity levels to keep food fresh up to 2x longer. Operates without a stabiliser in voltage ranges from 100V to 300V.

specs.In The Box: Refrigerator, Ice Tray, Egg Tray, User Manual, Warranty Card

reviews.author: Rahul S.
reviews.title: Perfect Family Fridge
reviews.comment: 253L is ideal for a family of four. The Digital Inverter compressor is whisper quiet. Convertible 5-in-1 is super useful during festivals for extra space. Excellent purchase.

reviews.author: Deepika S.
reviews.title: Energy Efficient and Spacious
reviews.comment: All-Around Cooling keeps food fresh longer. Stabiliser-free operation is essential in my area with frequent voltage fluctuations. 3 Star rating keeps electricity bills manageable.

reviews.author: Arjun P.
reviews.title: Samsung Quality
reviews.comment: Been a Samsung appliance user for years and this doesn't disappoint. The Twin Cooling keeps fruits fresh for over a week. Build quality is premium. 10-year compressor warranty is reassuring.

reviews.author: Kavita N.
reviews.title: Good Fridge, Slow Delivery
reviews.comment: The fridge itself is excellent ‚Äî spacious, quiet, and keeps food perfectly cold. Installation team was professional. Delivery took 5 extra days though. Product is 5 stars, delivery is 3.

title: LG 8 Kg Front Load Washing Machine
offers: Bank Offer: 10% off on SBI Credit Card, up to ‚Çπ2,000
Old Appliance Exchange: Up to ‚Çπ3,000 off
highlights: AI Direct Drive Motor with 20-Year Warranty
description: The LG 8Kg Front Load Washing Machine with AI Direct Drive technology automatically detects the fabric type and load weight, then selects the optimal wash motion from 6 different patterns for the gentlest and most effective clean. The Direct Drive motor connects directly to the drum without a belt or pulley, reducing vibrations and noise. Steam Wash eliminates 99.9% of allergens by penetrating deep into fabric fibres. The Inverter motor delivers 36% more energy savings compared to conventional models, earning a 5 Star energy rating. The in-built heater heats water up to 60¬∞C for intensive cleaning of heavily soiled garments. 14 wash programs cover everything from delicates to heavy-duty loads.

specs.In The Box: Washing Machine, Inlet Hose, Drain Hose, User Manual, Warranty Card

reviews.author: Priya M.
reviews.title: Clothes Come Out Pristine
reviews.comment: The AI Direct Drive detects fabric type automatically ‚Äî delicates are treated gently, heavy loads get deep cleaning. Steam wash removed all allergens from baby clothes. Love it.

reviews.author: Vikram K.
reviews.title: Quiet and Efficient
reviews.comment: Barely any vibration even at 1200 RPM spin. The 5 Star energy rating shows in my electricity bill ‚Äî noticeably lower than my old top-loader. 14 wash programs cover everything.

reviews.author: Meera J.
reviews.title: Excellent Front Loader
reviews.comment: Great washing results and the in-built heater is perfect for sanitising towels and bed sheets. 8Kg handles our family laundry in fewer loads. Only downside ‚Äî long wash cycles.

reviews.author: Sanjay B.
reviews.title: Worth the Investment
reviews.comment: Expensive upfront but saves money long-term with energy efficiency and the 20-year motor warranty. Child lock is essential with toddlers around. Installation by LG team was smooth.

title: Crompton Energion Ceiling Fan
offers: Bank Offer: 5% Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Card
highlights: Suitable for Room Size up to 150 sq ft
description: The Crompton Energion HS ceiling fan is designed for powerful air circulation in medium to large rooms. With a 1200mm sweep and high-speed motor delivering 225 CMM of air at 400 RPM, it provides excellent air delivery that keeps your room cool and comfortable. The aerodynamically designed blades ensure efficient airflow with minimal noise. The powder-coated finish resists rust and corrosion, maintaining the fan's appearance over years of use. Easy to install with standard mounting hardware included. Suitable for rooms up to 150 sq ft. Backed by Crompton's 2-year manufacturer warranty.

specs.In The Box: Fan Body, 3 Blades, Mounting Rod, Canopy, Screws, Manual

reviews.author: Manish K.
reviews.title: Good Airflow
reviews.comment: Delivers strong air even at medium speed. Covers my 12x12 bedroom easily. The powder-coated finish looks good on the ceiling. Runs quietly even at full speed.

reviews.author: Aditya B.
reviews.title: Value for Money Fan
reviews.comment: Crompton makes reliable fans and this one is no different. Installation was easy with standard fittings. Air delivery is good for the price. Runs smoothly without wobble.

reviews.author: Nisha P.
reviews.title: Best Budget Ceiling Fan
reviews.comment: Bought 3 for different rooms and all perform excellently. The 1200mm sweep covers medium to large rooms well. Energy efficient compared to my old fans. Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Suresh R.
reviews.title: Does the Job Well
reviews.comment: Simple, effective ceiling fan. Good air delivery at all speeds. Powder coating looks fresh even after monsoon season. Crompton's 2-year warranty gives peace of mind.

title: Butterfly Rapid 1.5 L Electric Kettle
offers: Coupon: Flat ‚Çπ50 off on first order
description: The Butterfly Rapid 1.5L Electric Kettle brings water to a rolling boil in just minutes with its powerful 1500W heating element. The food-grade stainless steel inner body ensures safe, taste-free boiling for tea, coffee, instant noodles, and more. Safety is built-in with automatic shut-off when water reaches boiling point and dry-boil protection that prevents the kettle from operating without water. The cool-touch handle stays comfortable even when the kettle is hot, while the 360¬∞ swivel base allows you to lift and place the kettle from any angle. The concealed heating element makes cleaning effortless and prevents limescale buildup. An LED indicator lets you know when the kettle is in operation.

specs.In The Box: Kettle, Power Base Unit, User Manual

reviews.author: Ritu S.
reviews.title: Quick and Convenient
reviews.comment: Boils water incredibly fast ‚Äî perfect for morning chai rush. Auto shut-off works reliably every time. The stainless steel body is easy to clean. Essential kitchen appliance.

reviews.author: Varun D.
reviews.title: Perfect for Hostel Life
reviews.comment: This kettle is my hostel room's most useful appliance. Instant noodles, tea, coffee, soup ‚Äî handles everything. Compact size doesn't take much space. Auto cut-off is a lifesaver.

reviews.author: Anjali T.
reviews.title: Good Build Quality
reviews.comment: Stainless steel inner body feels quality. The 360¬∞ base is convenient. Boils 1.5L in about 5 minutes. Cool-touch handle is genuinely cool. LED indicator is helpful.

reviews.author: Gaurav H.
reviews.title: Kitchen Essential
reviews.comment: Use this 4-5 times a day and it's been going strong for 8 months. No limescale buildup thanks to the concealed element. Dry boil protection tested accidentally once ‚Äî it works!

title: L'Oreal Paris Hyaluronic Acid Serum
offers: Coupon: Flat ‚Çπ100 off on beauty products above ‚Çπ499
description: L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Serum with 1.5% pure Hyaluronic Acid provides intense hydration that plumps skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Hyaluronic acid is a powerful humectant that can hold up to 1000x its weight in water, drawing moisture from the environment into your skin for lasting hydration. The lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue, making it perfect to layer under your moisturiser and makeup. Dermatologist tested and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Clinical trials show visible improvement in skin firmness and hydration in just 2 weeks of daily use. Apply 2-3 drops to cleansed face and neck, morning and night.

reviews.author: Divya C.
reviews.title: Visible Results in 2 Weeks
reviews.comment: My skin has never been this hydrated. Fine lines around my eyes have visibly reduced. The serum absorbs quickly and doesn't feel sticky under makeup. Holy grail product.

reviews.author: Sneha D.
reviews.title: Great Hydrating Serum
reviews.comment: Noticeable improvement in skin plumpness and glow after 3 weeks. The lightweight formula works well under sunscreen. Paraben-free is a big plus. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.author: Tanvi R.
reviews.title: Best Serum at This Price
reviews.comment: Tried many hyaluronic acid serums but L'Oreal's formula is superior. Skin feels bouncy and hydrated all day. 30ml lasts about 2 months with daily use. Excellent value.

reviews.author: Nisha P.
reviews.title: Good for Dry Skin
reviews.comment: My dry skin has improved dramatically. No more flakiness even in Delhi winter. The dropper dispenser is hygienic and easy to use. Recommend using with a good moisturiser on top.

title: Maybelline Fit Me Foundation
offers: Buy any 2 Maybelline products and get a free makeup pouch
highlights: Available in 18 Shades for Indian Skin Tones
description: Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Liquid Foundation is specifically formulated to mattify and refine pores for a natural, flawless finish. The oil-free formula with micro-powders controls shine throughout the day without drying out your skin. Available in 18 shades carefully curated for Indian skin tones ‚Äî from fair to deep ‚Äî to help you find your perfect match. SPF 22 provides everyday sun protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays. The lightweight, buildable coverage lets you go from a natural everyday look to full coverage for events. Dermatologically tested and suitable for normal to oily skin types. For best results, apply with a damp beauty blender for a seamless, airbrushed finish.

reviews.author: Priya M.
reviews.title: Perfect Shade Match
reviews.comment: Finally found a foundation that matches my skin tone perfectly. The matte finish lasts 6-7 hours without touchup. Doesn't clog pores. The 18 shades for Indian skin is appreciated.

reviews.author: Ananya R.
reviews.title: Best Drugstore Foundation
reviews.comment: This foundation gives medium coverage that looks natural. Blurs pores beautifully. SPF 22 is a bonus. I use shade 230 and it blends seamlessly. Repurchased 3 times already.

reviews.author: Kavita N.
reviews.title: Good but Oxidises Slightly
reviews.comment: Coverage and finish are great. Only note ‚Äî it oxidises slightly darker after 2 hours, so pick one shade lighter. Oil control is impressive for my oily T-zone. Good value.

reviews.author: Deepika S.
reviews.title: Great Everyday Foundation
reviews.comment: Perfect for daily use ‚Äî lightweight, buildable coverage, and SPF protection. The matte finish controls shine well. At this price, you can't ask for more. Suitable for oily skin.

title: LEGO Classic Creative Brick Box (790 Pcs)
offers: Coupon: Flat ‚Çπ200 off on toys above ‚Çπ999
description: The LEGO Classic Creative Brick Box sparks imagination and provides hours of creative play for children aged 4 and above. With 790 LEGO pieces in 33 different colours, the possibilities are truly limitless. The set includes special elements like windows, doors, wheels, eyes, and roof tiles that encourage kids to build houses, vehicles, animals, and anything their imagination can dream up. Each piece is made from durable ABS plastic that meets the highest global safety and quality standards, and is fully compatible with all existing LEGO sets. Comes in a sturdy storage box that makes clean-up easy and keeps bricks organised. An ideal gift that develops fine motor skills, spatial reasoning, and creative problem-solving.

specs.Special Elements: Windows, Doors, Wheels, Eyes, Roof Tiles
specs.In The Box: 790 LEGO Pieces, Building Ideas Booklet, Storage Box

reviews.author: Rajesh W.
reviews.title: Kid Absolutely Loves It!
reviews.comment: Bought this for my 5-year-old's birthday and he hasn't stopped building since. The 790 pieces provide endless creativity. The storage box makes cleanup easy. Best investment for kids.

reviews.author: Meera J.
reviews.title: Hours of Creative Fun
reviews.comment: Both my kids (ages 6 and 9) play with this together. The variety of pieces and colours sparks incredible creativity. LEGO quality as always ‚Äî no sharp edges, perfect fit.

reviews.author: Amit V.
reviews.title: Excellent Toy
reviews.comment: Great set with lots of variety. The special pieces like wheels and windows add so many possibilities. Only wish the instruction booklet had more building ideas. Kids love it.

reviews.author: Sunita K.
reviews.title: Educational and Fun
reviews.comment: My daughter's creativity has flourished since getting this set. She builds something new every day. Compatible with her older LEGO sets too. Worth the price for the quality.

title: Hot Wheels 10 Car Gift Pack
description: The Hot Wheels 10 Car Gift Pack is the perfect starter set or addition to any car collection. Each 1:64 scale die-cast metal car features authentic detailing, realistic graphics, and rolling wheels. The pack includes an assortment of cars from Hot Wheels' most popular series ‚Äî from classic muscle cars and sports cars to futuristic concept vehicles. All cars are compatible with Hot Wheels tracks, playsets, and accessories, encouraging imaginative play and racing adventures. The die-cast metal bodies are built to withstand high-speed crashes and rough play. BIS certified for child safety. An excellent gift for birthdays, holidays, or just because.

reviews.author: Arjun P.
reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Car-Loving Kids
reviews.comment: My son was thrilled with this 10-car set. Each car has unique detailing and rolls perfectly on Hot Wheels tracks. Die-cast quality feels solid. Great value gift pack.

reviews.author: Sanjay B.
reviews.title: Good Variety of Cars
reviews.comment: Nice mix of muscle cars, sports cars, and concept vehicles. Paint quality is good for the price. My 4-year-old plays with them daily. Compatible with all our existing tracks.

reviews.author: Gaurav H.
reviews.title: Collector's Delight
reviews.comment: As an adult Hot Wheels collector, this pack offers good value. Some exclusive designs in this set. Die-cast bodies are hefty and well-made. Packaging is collector-worthy.

reviews.author: Divya C.
reviews.title: Birthday Party Hit
reviews.comment: Bought multiple packs as return gifts for my son's birthday party. Every kid loved them. Good quality, safe for children, and reasonably priced. Will buy again.

title: Aashirvaad Superior MP Atta 10 kg
description: Aashirvaad Superior MP Atta is made from the finest Sharbati wheat sourced from the heartlands of Madhya Pradesh. This wheat variety is known for its golden grain, naturally sweet taste, and high protein content. The atta goes through ITC's proprietary 4-stage wheat cleaning process to remove impurities, ensuring you get the purest whole wheat flour. It is 100% atta with 0% maida, retaining the natural fibre, vitamins, and minerals present in the wheat bran. The flour absorbs more water than regular atta, yielding softer, rounder rotis that stay fresh for longer. Each batch is tested for consistency in grain size to ensure uniform results every time you cook.

specs.Storage: Cool & Dry Place, Away from Sunlight

reviews.author: Lakshmi V.
reviews.title: Best Atta for Soft Rotis
reviews.comment: Aashirvaad MP atta consistently makes the softest rotis. The dough is easy to knead and absorbs water perfectly. My family can immediately tell if I switch brands. Loyal customer.

reviews.author: Prakash M.
reviews.title: Premium Quality Atta
reviews.comment: Sharbati wheat quality is noticeably better than regular atta. Rotis are soft even hours after making. 10kg pack lasts our family of 4 about 3 weeks. Good value.

reviews.author: Sunita K.
reviews.title: Family's First Choice
reviews.comment: Been buying Aashirvaad for over 10 years. The consistency is amazing ‚Äî every batch produces perfectly soft chapatis. 0% maida claim is trustworthy. Stock up during sales.

reviews.author: Tanvi R.
reviews.title: Good Atta, Prompt Delivery
reviews.comment: Flipkart delivered 10kg to my door which saved a trip to the store. Atta quality is excellent as always. Packaging was intact. Rotis come out round and soft every time.

title: Maggi 2-Minute Masala Noodles (Pack of 12)
description: Maggi 2-Minute Masala Noodles have been India's favourite instant noodles for over three decades. The iconic masala tastemaker blend of spices delivers that unmistakable Maggi flavour that generations have grown up loving. Each 70g pack is ready in just 2 minutes ‚Äî simply boil water, add the noodles, stir in the tastemaker, and enjoy. Fortified with iron and protein, Maggi provides a tasty snack that also contributes to your daily nutritional intake. Made with no added MSG ‚Äî the savoury taste comes entirely from the carefully selected spice blend. This value pack of 12 is perfect for stocking your pantry for quick meals, late-night cravings, and hostel essentials.

reviews.author: Varun D.
reviews.title: Hostel Survival Essential
reviews.comment: Maggi is the ultimate comfort food. 2-minute claim is genuine ‚Äî quick, tasty, and satisfying. This 12-pack lasted me 2 weeks in my hostel. The masala flavour is unbeatable.

reviews.author: Nisha P.
reviews.title: India's Favourite Comfort Food
reviews.comment: No explanation needed ‚Äî it's Maggi! The masala tastemaker is perfectly spiced. I add veggies and an egg for a quick nutritious meal. 12-pack is the way to buy.

reviews.author: Ritu S.
reviews.title: Quick Fix for Late Nights
reviews.comment: Perfect for midnight cravings and lazy Sunday lunches. Consistent taste every time. Good that it has no added MSG now. Only wish they made a spicier variant.

reviews.author: Aditya B.
reviews.title: Pantry Staple
reviews.comment: Always keep Maggi stocked at home. The kids love it as an after-school snack. 12-pack value is better than buying individual packets from shops. Fresh and within expiry date.

title: Tata Gold Leaf Tea 1 kg

highlights: Sourced from India's Finest Tea Gardens
description: Tata Gold is a premium tea crafted from specially selected long leaf teas sourced from India's finest tea gardens in Assam and the Nilgiris. The leaves are carefully processed to preserve their natural flavour and aroma, delivering a cup that is rich, full-bodied, and deeply satisfying. The golden-amber liquor has a smooth, balanced taste with no bitterness ‚Äî perfect for those who appreciate the subtleties of a well-made cup of tea. Rich in natural antioxidants, Tata Gold is Rainforest Alliance Certified, ensuring that it is sourced using sustainable farming practices. The 1kg vacuum-sealed pack locks in freshness from the first cup to the last.

reviews.author: Suresh R.
reviews.title: Best Tea for Daily Chai
reviews.comment: Tata Gold has the perfect balance of strength and flavour. The aroma when brewing is heavenly. Makes excellent cutting chai ‚Äî strong, flavourful, without bitterness. 1kg lasts a month.

reviews.author: Lakshmi V.
reviews.title: Rich Taste, Great Aroma
reviews.comment: Long leaf tea quality is evident ‚Äî the brew is deep amber with a wonderful aroma. Tastes best with fresh milk and a pinch of elaichi. Vacuum-sealed pack keeps it fresh.

reviews.author: Prakash M.
reviews.title: Our Family Tea
reviews.comment: The whole family has been drinking Tata Gold for years. Rich, full-bodied flavour that satisfies with every cup. Rainforest Alliance certified is a nice ethical bonus.

reviews.author: Anjali T.
reviews.title: Premium Tea Experience
reviews.comment: Noticeably better than regular CTC teas. The long leaf gives a smoother, less bitter brew. Good for guests too ‚Äî always gets compliments. Reorder every month from Flipkart.
